name: John Smith
text: This is a great place, I love being a part of this work family.  Everyone is so willing to help and they offer great training.  Great people to work with.

name: Allyson Black
text: Absolutely a pleasure working with this company! They made the claim process so easy and took care of everything! This is hands down an amazing company with amazing employees!

resp.text:
Thank you! Our best to you and yours.

Gene Strother
VP, Operations

name: Douglas Dunsford
text:
Great recruiting program.  Referral program is steamlined and active.

Thanks Mid-America!

resp.text: Thank you Douglas, we appreciate the kind words!

name: Jacqueline Hebert
text: Claims are not expedited. I understand the overwhelming number of claims this year in 2020, but as a customer that pays premiums each year, I expect to receive what I pay for in a timely manner! I have sent all requested documentation for the release of loss of use funds and the company is taking their time approving the release, while my family is suffering and are on the verge of becoming homeless yet again. Insurance is supposed to prevent hardship in the face of catastrophic loss, not add to it!

resp.text:
Ms. Hebert,
Thank you for reaching out. We are sorry for your loss. Please email your specific concerns, along with your claim number, to info@midamcat.com so that we can look into this further.

Best to you and yours.

name: Stacie Brown
text: I love working for the company.  Very professional , understanding and you don’t feel like you are just a number. Management very friendly and always has an open door policy !!! Awesome carriers !!!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-star review, Stacie. We love working with you, too.

name: courtney belletty
text: Great place and carriers! Awesome firm to work with.

resp.text: Thank you, Courtney! You are a great partner.

name: Amber B
text: Amazing group of people to work with.

resp.text: Thank you, Amber! We are glad to have you on our team.
